There is a lot of transition going on this year at Silver Schools.
Much of it is thanks to the feedback we received on surveys we sent out in the Spring. One thing we heard loud and clear was the need for a single, more-consistent, communication method. The District has chosen ParentSquare as our new communication platform to help keep our parents informed. ParentSquare will replace School Messenger, Class Dojo, Remind, ClassTag, and various other apps throughout the district to help ensure parents aren't switching between multiple platforms. Parents should expect to receive invitation emails from ParentSquare in the upcoming week. More features will be added as students are scheduled into their classes. We appreciate our parents' feedback and their patience as we work to get this powerful tool rolled out to them, our teachers, and our administrators.

Fox Field and Ben Altamirano Fields will be open for recreation starting this afternoon about 4PM. Silver Consolidated Schools will follow the opening of the facilities per the guidance of the public health order and the Town of Silver City guidelines for the opening of the city parks. 2. Social Distancing of at least 6 feet between groups.

3. Bathrooms are closed to public use.

Please adhere to these guidelines for use of the facilities so you can enjoy your recreation time while making sure we work together for the safety and well-being of all people in our community. If these guidelines are not followed, the District will have to re-evaluate facility usage and may have to close these facilities to ensure public health and safety.
